title: Creeping Death: Short Peeks Into a Disturbed Mind
description: Creeping Death contains 11 of Armand Rosamilia's best previously published tales of horror, and 5 new stories original to this collection. Armand Rosamilia is a New Jersey boy currently living in sunny Florida, which gives him way too much inspiration to write about zombies and his Dying Days series. He writes stories about horror, heavy metal, steampunk, contemporary fiction, and anything else his mind conjures. He has over 70 stories/novellas/novels under his belt, with many more to come.
author: Armand Rosamilia
